description.ko: 유리 프리즘을 통과하는 빛을 매혹적으로 탐구하며 무지개와 기하학적 굴절의 춤을 만들어냅니다.
description.en: A mesmerizing exploration of light passing through glass prisms, creating a dance of rainbows and geometric refraction.

prompt: High-resolution macro photography of light refraction through a triangular glass prism, vibrant rainbow spectrum, chromatic aberration, geometric glass edges, soft bokeh background, ethereal lighting, 8k resolution, cinematic composition.
